snippet: Aid is no more from rich country to poor, the author says. Instead, it is about giving presents.
abstract: Aid is no more from rich country to poor, the author says. Instead, it is about giving presents.
lead_paragraph: Finance Minister Pranab Mukherjee's view that India doesn't need British aid has raised some hackles in Britain and led to some proud strutting in India. And that's very understandable. Why should Britain continue giving aid to India? And why should India want it? After all, the whole concept of aid is changing.

headline.main: The Fanciful World of Foreign Aid
